alert.note: Alert for Independence; Izard; Sharp; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 5:46PM CDT until June 11 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Stone County in north central Arkansas... Northwestern Independence County in north central Arkansas... Izard County in north central Arkansas... Southwestern Sharp County in north central Arkansas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 546 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Culp, or 13 miles north of Mountain View, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Melbourne... Calico Rock... Cushman... Mount Pleasant... Pineville... Sidney... Brandenberg... Croker... Lone Star... Gorby... Gid... Herpel... Stella... Lunenburg... Lacrosse... Blanchard Springs Campground... Evening Shade... Guion... Allison... Mt Olive in Izard County... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
